    CompletableFuture<DirectoryUploadResponse>
    AsyncBucketClient.uploadDirectory(DirectoryUploadRequest directoryUploadRequest)
    Uploads the directory content to substrate-specific Blob storage Note: Specifying the contentLength in the UploadRequest can dramatically improve upload efficiency because the substrate SDKs do not need to buffer the contents and calculate it themselves.
